title: SSLTLS certificate
extract: SSL Stands for secure sockets layer. Protocol for web browsers and servers that allows for the authentication, encryption and decryption of data sent over the Internet. ... Wildcard SSL certificates Type of certificate used to secure multiple subdomains.
extract_html: SSL Stands for secure sockets layer. Protocol for web browsers and servers that allows for the authentication, encryption and decryption of data sent over the Internet. ... Wildcard SSL certificates Type of certificate used to secure multiple subdomains.
